pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Chancellor Angela Merkel | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany.

The leaders discussed their shared priorities for the upcoming G7 Summit that Canada will host in Charlevoix on June 8 and 9, 2018.

The Prime Minister and the Chancellor emphasized the need for comprehensive discussions on economic growth that benefits everyone, gender equality and women’s empowerment, girls’ education, and peace and security.

The leaders re-affirmed their commitment to open, rules-based international trade.
